column2:
"They seem so relaxed most of the time. You'd think they could forgive one teeny tiny little stray bullet, right?
Man, what a pain..."
"I mean, I get it, I'd be mad if someone shot me by mistake too. But man, those things just go nuts about it."

"You gotta see them for yourself, killer.
I bet that now you know what's comin', you'll take 'em down no trouble at all."
"I'm counting on you! I'll be checking the whole thing out on the monitor, and with a big ol' smile on my face! Go get 'em!"
